blogPost.excerpt: Go Mail Merge enables you to send bulk personalized emails with personalized attachments easily from Google Sheets. Create email campaigns with Gmail and Google Sheets. Personalize & track each email sent.
blogPost.body: Go Mail Merge enables you to send bulk personalized emails with personalized attachments easily from Google Sheets. Create email campaigns with Gmail and Google Sheets. Personalize & track each email sent.
blogPost.title: Go Mail Merge - Send bulk personalized emails with personalized attachments
blogPost.author: Rami

localize.description: Go Mail Merge使您能够轻松地从Google Sheets发送带有个性化附件的批量个性化电子邮件。使用Gmail和Google Sheets创建电子邮件活动。个性化和跟踪每封邮件的发送。
localize.tagline: 发送带有个性化附件的批量个性化电子邮件。

localize.description: Go Mail Merge使您能夠輕鬆地從Google Sheets發送帶有個性化附件的批量個性化電子郵件。使用Gmail和Google Sheets創建電子郵件活動。個性化和跟蹤每封郵件的發送。
localize.tagline: 發送帶有個性化附件的批量個性化電子郵件。

previous.excerpt: Doppler is a beautifully designed music player designed and built for people who buy music. Import music and playlists to listen offline, and edit song and album artwork and info without syncing. Now with support for Siri, Spotlight Search, and CarPlay.
previous.title: Doppler 2.3 - iOS music player for people who buy music

localize.description: 多普达是一款设计精美的音乐播放器，专为购买音乐的人设计和打造。导入音乐和播放列表进行离线收听，并在不同步的情况下编辑歌曲和专辑封面和信息。现在支持Siri、Spotlight搜索和CarPlay。
localize.tagline: 为购买音乐的人准备的iOS音乐播放器

localize.description: 多普達是一款設計精美的音樂播放器，專爲購買音樂的人設計和打造。導入音樂和播放列表進行離線收聽，並在不同步的情況下編輯歌曲和專輯封面和信息。現在支持Siri、Spotlight搜索和CarPlay。
localize.tagline: 爲購買音樂的人準備的iOS音樂播放器

next.excerpt: Build an admin panel for your Rails application in a minute. No code, no hassle — save time and money by trying Forest Admin for free.
next.title: Forest Admin for Rails - Fully-featured admin panel for Ruby on Rails apps

localize.description: 在一分钟内为您的Rails应用程序建立一个管理面板。没有代码，没有麻烦--免费试用Forest Admin，节省时间和金钱。
localize.tagline: 为Ruby on Rails应用程序提供功能齐全的管理面板。

localize.description: 在一分鐘內爲您的Rails應用程序建立一個管理面板。沒有代碼，沒有麻煩--免費試用Forest Admin，節省時間和金錢。
localize.tagline: 爲Ruby on Rails應用程序提供功能齊全的管理面板。
